tns:patch.author: Viorel Chihai
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_validation_status; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_validation_status AS SELECT q.amp_activity_id, q.approval_status as approval_status, q.approval_status as approval_status_id FROM ( SELECT aav.amp_activity_id, (CASE WHEN aav.draft = true THEN CASE WHEN aav.approval_status='approved' OR aav.approval_status='edited' THEN 3 ELSE 1 END ELSE CASE WHEN (aav.approval_status='approved' OR aav.approval_status='startedapproved') THEN 4 WHEN aav.approval_status='edited' OR aav.approval_status='not_approved' OR aav.approval_status='rejected' THEN 0 WHEN aav.approval_status='started' THEN 2 ELSE 999999999 END END) AS approval_status FROM amp_activity_version aav) AS q;
